item.title: Other Community Resources
item.description: What’s so fantastic about Meshtastic? by KO6CNT - Presented to PAARA on June 6, 2024 Meshtastic @ Benicia Amateur Radio Club by KJ6FNQ Jon Davis. Meshtastic “Pitch” Deck by KJ6FNQ Jon Davis - Basics used for other presentation and in person events such as Maker Faire.
